name: DiMEO CONSTRUCTION COMPANY v. AMICA MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY
name_abbreviation: DiMeo Construction Co. v. Amica Mutual Insurance

parties: DiMEO CONSTRUCTION COMPANY v. AMICA MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari and petitioner’s motion for stay are denied.

attorneys: Robert D. Parrillo, Providence, for petitioner.
Michael P. DeFanti, Providence, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
DiMEO CONSTRUCTION COMPANY v. AMICA MUTUAL INSURANCE COMPANY.
No. 84-183-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
April 19, 1984.
Robert D. Parrillo, Providence, for petitioner.
Michael P. DeFanti, Providence, for respondent.
